title: The Silent Reader
author: Amelia Grant
description: A gripping tale of a librarian who uncovers a century-old secret hidden in the pages of an ancient book.

title: Echoes of the Cosmos
author: Dr. Neil Harper
description: An astronaut’s journey through a wormhole reveals the truth about humanity’s place in the universe.

title: Whispers of the Past
author: Lydia Moore
description: A young woman in 18th-century Bengal discovers her family’s hidden legacy during a time of upheaval.

title: Code to Success
author: Mark Evans
description: A practical guide to achieving personal growth through discipline, creativity, and resilience.

title: Love in Monochrome
author: Sofia Khan
description: Two artists find love and inspiration in a world where colors are forbidden.

title: Poems of the Horizon
author: Ravi Das
description: A collection of heartfelt poems exploring themes of nature, love, and self-discovery.
